mapper.select: SELECT seq, regtime, appkey, package_name, gaid, ifa, ifv, model, network, os_ver, sdk_version, platform, country, language, width, height, carrier, FROM_UNIXTIME(first_install_time) as first_install_time, event_type_code, conversion_ip, FROM_UNIXTIME(event_time) as event_time, session_id, cb_param1, cb_param2, cb_param3, cb_param4, cb_param5, activity_group, activity, activity_param, order_id, product_id, product_name, price, quantity, sales, category, currency, event_detail FROM postback_adbrixre WHERE seq=#{seq} LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO postback_adbrixre ( regtime, appkey, package_name, gaid, ifa, ifv, model, network, os_ver, sdk_version, platform, country, language, width, height, carrier, first_install_time, event_type_code, conversion_ip, event_time, session_id, cb_param1, cb_param2, cb_param3, cb_param4, cb_param5, activity_group, activity, activity_param, order_id, product_id, product_name, price, quantity, sales, category, currency, event_detail ) VALUES ( CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{appkey}, #{package_name}, #{gaid}, #{ifa}, #{ifv}, #{model}, #{network}, #{os_ver}, #{sdk_version}, #{platform}, #{country}, #{language}, #{width}, #{height}, #{carrier}, #{first_install_time}, #{event_type_code}, #{conversion_ip}, #{event_time}, #{session_id}, #{cb_param1}, #{cb_param2}, #{cb_param3}, #{cb_param4}, #{cb_param5}, #{activity_group}, #{activity}, #{activity_param}, #{order_id}, #{product_id}, #{product_name}, #{price}, #{quantity}, #{sales}, #{category}, #{currency}, #{event_detail} )
